        <protocols>
            <bgp>
                <group>
                    <name>PEERS</name>
                    <type>external</type>
                    <neighbor>
                        <name>10.12.0.12</name>
                        <peer-as>64002</peer-as>
                    </neighbor>
                </group>
            </bgp>
        </protocols>
</configuration>
